China: Emperor Xiangzong of Western Xia became emperor of Western Xia.
Estonia: Valdemar II of Denmark builds a fortress in Saaremaa, but burns it down after finding no volunteers to man it.
India: Qutb-ud-din Aibak establishes slave Dynasty later to be known as Delhi Sultanate
Latvia: The Brothers of the Sword and their Semigallian allies defeated the Livonians and Latgalians.
